comments.author: DEAstriker
comments.body: If you continue waiting for Bitcoin to be low before you buy, you might be missing out or get disappointed. So as a Cryptocurrency investors it can be high-risk and volatile. It is generally recommended to diversify your investment portfolio, not invest more than you can afford to lose, and make informed decisions based on your own financial situation and risk tolerance. Timing the market and trying to predict price movements is challenging, so it's best to consider a long-term investment approach rather than trying to time short-term price fluctuations.
